full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
## Title
Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS).

## Reference Number
1000033078

## Solicitation Number
1000033078

## Publication Date
2024-05-13

## Tender Closing Date
2024-05-28T14:00:00

## Tender Status
Expired

## Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
81111504 Application Programming Services

## Procurement Category
SRV

## Notice Type
RFQ against Supply Arrangement

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Selection Criteria
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Trade Agreements
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

## Regions of Opportunity
Canada

## Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity
The Department of Justice Canada, located at 284 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H8

## Contracting Authority
Ryan Greig
Phone: (416) 997-3148
Email: [Ryan.Greig@justice.gc.ca](mailto:Ryan.Greig@justice.gc.ca)

## Tender Description
The Department of Justice Canada is seeking a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) supplier to provide services that support the Business Analytics (BA) team. The service includes the development of a sustainable technological platform for business intelligence, AI-powered solutions, and tools, as well as data management. The contract period will be from the expected start date of 2024-06-17 to 2030-03-31.

## Security Requirement
Common PS SRCL #19 applies
Minimum Corporate Security Required: Facility Security Clearance at the level of Secret
Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret

## Request for
